__e: Do you also think it was a sort of "meaningless detail"... that when you came into the living room, I was there, completely alone?
As insignificant as it might seem, you know very well that it means it's all over.
But now I feel that if I could only do something... some little thing for, before I die, some little thing for progress... for people, maybe.
So all you've done is proved to them that I'm a meaningless secretary and you're another humorless bitch.
What I wanted to say is that when you're a child. what is most important to others seems insignificant to you .and then suddenly things change.
You think school is boring and meaningless, wait till you see what I do for a living.
That's a pretty hard thing for me to admit, because he's such a waste of space and all, but... you know, it's true.
I know it may seem small and insignificant, but it's not about what it is, it's about what it can become.
I may feel insignificant, but I certainly don't want to be like the animals watching as the planet goes down the drain.
